verbs.description: [ARG0: italy] [V: seeks] [ARG1: to reassure us over spending plans students across italy demonstrated against the government education funding plans in the first widespread show of dissidence against the new populist government students demonstrated in 50 cities including some 3 000 who ended their protest outside the education ministry in rome hundreds gathered in the northern city of turin where protesters burned effigies of deputy premiers matteo salvini and luigi di maio a student leader told radio 24 that the education ministry had not accepted their request to meet parliament bali government matteo salvini twitter milan illinois milan economics ministry eu european union steven mnuchin education ministry italy luigi di maio eu commission giammarco manfreda turin rome u s giovanni tria]
